title: Strategies for Innovating Learning Spaces through the Use of Digital Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to innovate learning spaces in social studies subjects by enhancing teachers' competency in using digital textbooks. Focuses on developing strategies executable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more methods for selecting and applying customized digital textbook content.
Learners can design lesson plans utilizing interactive features (quizzes, note sharing, etc.) of smartphone-based digital textbooks.
Learners can analyze five technical/educational challenges anticipated when introducing digital textbooks and propose solutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
